mapper.select: select distinct p.id from bms_permission p inner join bms_role_permission rp on p.id = rp.permission_id inner join bms_role r on r.id = rp.role_id inner join bms_user_role ur on ur.role_id = r.id inner join bms_user u on u.id = ur.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId} and p.is_deleted = 'N' and rp.is_deleted = 'N' and r.is_deleted = 'N' and ur.is_deleted = 'N' and u.is_deleted = 'N'

select distinct p.id from bms_permission p inner join bms_role_permission rp on p.id = rp.permission_id inner join bms_role r on r.id = rp.role_id inner join bms_user_role ur on ur.role_id = r.id inner join bms_user u on u.id = ur.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId} and p.is_deleted = 'N' and rp.is_deleted = 'N' and r.is_deleted = 'N' and ur.is_deleted = 'N' and u.is_deleted = 'N' UNION SELECT b.permission_id FROM bms_user_permission b WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.is_deleted = 'N' AND b.type = '+'
